author: billbarker
msg: Add support for the debug="true" and verbose="true" attributes on Builders.
Now we match the documentation for Builders that support either (actually, verbose isn't documented, but it was sooo obviously intended to be supported I added it).
I've tested this, and it works fine.  However, I'll leave a little time for comments before porting to 'live'.

author: grahamd
msg: A mod_python.publisher __auth__() function nested inside another function
will now execute in context of globals from module the function is contained
in and not in context of globals from mod_python.publisher. (MODPYTHON-43)
